Content.Title: Nursing

Images.Alt: Image of the towers in the help menu.

Text: The Nursing tower shots projectiles (i.e. syringes) at the bees to hurt them. Upgradeing this tower upgrades the projectiles or the tower itself.

Content.Title: Computational Science

Images.Alt: Image of the towers in the help menu.

Text: The Computational Science tower produces "robots" that will fight bees until they die. The tower will only summon a robot if the robot it "owns" dies. Therefore, each tower can only have one robot at a time. When you upgrade this tower it upgrades the robots.

Content.Title: Upgrades

Images.Alt: Image of the upgrade in the help menu.

Text: There are up to 5 different upgrades you can apply to each tower. They are as follows
Attack - Increase damage of projectiles or robots.
Defense - (Can only be applied to Comp. Sci.) Increase health of robots.
Time - Decrease time between attacks of tower or robots.
Radius - Increase range of towers or robots.
Sell - Sells the tower for part of the total gold spent on it.
